home.title: Error Pages
home.subtitle: A collection of beautifully designed error pages with attractive and interactive user interfaces
home.footer: Designed using React, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion

400.title: Bad Request
400.description: The server cannot process your request due to invalid syntax or malformed data

401.title: Unauthorized
401.description: You must log in or verify your identity to access this page

403.title: Access Forbidden
403.description: You don't have permission to access this page or resource

404.title: Page Not Found
404.description: Sorry, the page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved to another location

408.title: Request Timeout
408.description: The server timed out waiting for your request. Please try again

410.title: Gone
410.description: The requested resource is no longer available and will not be available again

418.title: I'm a teapot
418.description: I'm a teapot, short and stout. I cannot brew coffee, only tea!

429.title: Too Many Requests
429.description: You have sent too many requests in a short period. Please slow down

500.title: Internal Server Error
500.description: An internal server error occurred. Please try again later

502.title: Bad Gateway
502.description: The server received an invalid response from the upstream server

503.title: Service Unavailable
503.description: The service is currently unavailable due to maintenance or overload. Please try again later

504.title: Gateway Timeout
504.description: The server did not receive a timely response from the upstream server

507.title: Insufficient Storage
507.description: The server is unable to store the representation needed to complete the request

511.title: Network Authentication Required
511.description: You need to authenticate to gain network access
